This property is listed by epropertysites.com for $274,999. 5 Patricia Ct has 4 beds, 2 baths, and approximately 2,300 square feet. The property has a lot size of 12,412 sqft and was built in 1970. 5 Patricia Ct is in North Babylon and in ZIP Code 11703 . The list price of $274,999 is 10% lower than the average list price of $306,348 for 11703 real estate and 11% lower than the average list price of $307,693 for North Babylon, NY real estate .
